item.description:
Official Rules:
http://nivea.eprize.n...

The Contest begins on October 2, 2008 at 12:00 a.m. Eastern Time ("ET") and ends on January 29, 2009 at 11:59 p.m. ET (the "Contest Period"). The Contest consists of two (2) entry periods (each an "Entry Period") each comprised of three (3) phases as set forth in the chart below.

http://nivea.eprize.n...
NIVEA's looking for the most kissable person. Upload your best kiss pic now to the NIVEA XOXO Photo Contest, then tell us why you're so kissable. You could win a VIP trip for two to NYC for New Yearâ€™s Eve!

http://www.flickr.com...
Welcome to the wonderful world of kissability! This group is all about celebrating the kiss, so give us your favorite shots (rated PG, please). As the rules clearly state when you join this group, these photos will be used ONLY for display in this gallery and on the NIVEAxoxo.com website. If you want to enter your photo into the NIVEA XOXO Photo Contest...you have to then enter it at NIVEAxoxo.com. Winner gets a trip for 2 to NYC for a VIP event on New Year's Eve. Thanks!
item.name: NIVEA XOXO Photo Contest
